name: MesonYahooAdapter
summary: MesonSDK is a modular SDK for all demand. Providing you with a low code solution, that is very easy to integrate.
description: MesonSDK is a Mobile In-App Mediation platform that can be seamlessly integrated into your app with a modular SDK. Prime is built with transparency, control and neutrality as first principles. Prime is a great alternative to building an in-house mediation platform. It provides all the benefits of an in-house solution without the hassles of an in-house solution.
